mapper.sql: id, cadre_name, job, state, password, role
mapper.insert: insert into huse_cadre (id, cadre_name, job, state, password, role, `desc`) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cadreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into huse_cadre
id,
cadre_name,
job,
state,
password,
role,
`desc`,

mapper.update:
update huse_cadre
cadre_name = #{cadreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=CHAR},
`desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update huse_cadre set cadre_name = #{cadreName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, job = #{job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=BIT}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=CHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * from huse_cadre WHERE cadre_name LIKE '%${info}%'
